text: Tamen wen ni yuejing (de lu li), ni shuo:“Yuejing shi youhai de, gu zai jingqi zhong nimen yingdang likai qizi, buyao yu tamen jiaojie, zhidao tamen qingjie. Dang tamen xi jing de shihou, nimen keyi zai an la suo ming nimen de buwei yu tamen jiaojie.” An la dique xi'ai huizui de ren, dique xi'ai jiejing de ren
